QuestData.Title: Good Troll Hunting
QuestData.Description: Good for nothing wretches!$b$bThey could have had it easy. We extended our hand in peace. All they had to do was give us passage through Drak'Tharon and we'd have let them be.$b$bBut no, the prideful little ice trolls decided that they wanted it rough. Now they'll be destroyed and we'll pass through their precious keep to Zul'Drak anyway.$b$bWe've contracted a gang to deliver us captured trolls. Talk to Samir if you want in on the action. You can find him to the northwest of here, due south of Zeb'Halek.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sergeant Thurkin told you to speak to Samir at Granite Springs.
QuestData.RewardText: Here to get in on the bounty action, eh?
